Stop-loss strategy: If the stock price falls by more than 8% from its current price, trigger a sell order.
Stop Loss: 15% drop from current price, Trailing Stop: 5% below moving average
[Close below 15-day moving average or EPS decline by 20%]
Sell if price falls by 10% from current price or when EPS turns negative again.
[Stop loss triggered when ROE falls below -15% or EPS decreases by 20%]
